name: We aren't different
description: This art inspired by Ardhanarishvara - "The Half-female Lord", is a form of the Hindu deity Shiva combined with his consort Parvati. Ardhanarishvara is depicted as half-male and half-female, the right half is usually the male Shiva, illustrating his traditional attributes. Equally split down the middle which shows us the men and women aren’t so different. They are equally participate in this world to balance everything, positive and negative, true and false, good and bad.
